results.name: Expansion of 1/(1+x^2+2*x^3).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,-1,-2).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[1/(1+x^2+2*x^3), {x,0,50}], x] (* or *) LinearRecurrence[{0,-1,-2}, {1,0,-1}, 50] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Jun 23 2019 *)
